    • Method Detail

      • insertDelayedRequestObject

        public java.lang.String insertDelayedRequestObject(JavaScriptLocation javaScriptLocation,
                                          int absoluteStartPosition,
                                          int delayInMillis)
        Given JavaScript and position information of the target function, this method 'mutate' the function to insert a artificial delay.
        Parameters:
        javaScriptLocation - location of the JavaScript file
        absoluteStartPosition - start position of the mutation point from the beginning of code block.
        delayInMillis - delay in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        mutated code (either JavaScript or HTML including script tag).

      • modifyScriptTagForDelayedLoad

        public java.lang.String modifyScriptTagForDelayedLoad(java.lang.String pathToHtml,
                                             int scriptTagIndex,
                                             int delayInMillis)
        Modify part of the HTML to emulate the situation where content of certain script tag is loaded with delay.
        Parameters:
        pathToHtml - path to the HTML file
        scriptTagIndex - the index of the target script tag in the HTML
        delayInMillis - delay in milliseconds
        Returns:
        mutated HTML code
